pageContext.claim: “Would very much appreciate Saudi Arabia doing their IPO of Aramco with the New York Stock Exchange. Important to the United States!”
pageContext.analysis: The reason for the Saudi reluctance is because of passage of the Justice Against Sponsors of Terrorism Act, which could result in the seizure of Saudi assets. During the campaign, Trump strongly supported JASTA and blasted Obama for vetoing it. (Congress overturned Obama's veto.)
